sectionTitle: Why do people praise about Mitech?

testimonials.subject: The Mitech team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: There are thousands of IT service companies in the US. But there’s nothing like @Mitech. Their popularity and reputation are just evident.
testimonials.name: Maggie Strickland

testimonials.subject: The Mitech team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
testimonials.desc: I’ve been working with over 35 IT companies on more than 200 projects of our company, but @Mitech is one of the most impressive to me.
testimonials.name: Robert Amplilian
